trans-unit.source: Represents an object that specifies the layout of a row of data.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 행의 레이아웃을 지정하는 개체를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classes support the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> 지 원하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> 에 대 한 보기 모드는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to style rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> 스타일 행에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter" /> class.
The area to use to display the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
Positions the content of a row according to the size of the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 해당 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> 개체의 크기에 따라 행의 내용을 배치합니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that is used to display the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
Gets or sets the data content to display in a row.
trans-unit.target: 행에 표시할 데이터 내용을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the content of a row.

The typical usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to place it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 사용의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> 에 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 배치 하는 것에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 컨트롤의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The template binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> property to a property of the control by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: 서식 파일을 바인딩하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> 속성을 사용 하 여 컨트롤의 속성 [TemplateBinding 태그 확장](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 바인딩하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> dependency property.
[Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)
The maximum area to use to display the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
Determines the area that is required to display the row.
trans-unit.target: 행을 표시하는 데 필요한 영역을 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> of the area that displays the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
Returns a string representation of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
A string that shows the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
